name: Coins Collecting Escape Challenge - The Most Addicting, Challenging and Hardest Game Ever
name_original: Coins Collecting Escape Challenge - The Most Addicting, Challenging and Hardest Game Ever
description:
Coins Collecting Escape Challenge is a very challenging fun addictive game, The goal of this game is to collect all the coins until the circular bar in the center completely fills up. But beware, there are enemies who spawn every second and will always run towards you.


Your ship will always be moving forward. Tap on the left side of your device to turn left and tap on the right side to turn right.

There will be a "box" power up which will turn off the ships of your enemies and that will be the right time to destroy them because the less number of enemies the more chances to win!!

Can you be the first person to collect all the coins in very little time?

This game has 3 modes, Can you beat them all??? Try to find out!

Have fun!!
